amendment.description: An amendment No. 57 printed in House Report 113-170 to prevent any funds from being used to plan for or carry out furloughs of Dual Status Military Technicians.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 57 printed in House Report 113-170 to prevent any funds from being used to plan for or carry out furloughs of Dual Status Military Technicians.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Palazzo amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Palazzo amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. Palazzo.
